AYUSH  GURTU   
 ayush.gurtu.2024@mitb.smu.edu.sg  
  +65 87106924          
 www.linkedin.com/in/ayush -gurtu  
   
 EDUCATION  
SINGAPORE MAN AGEMENT UNIVERSITY  Aug 2024 - Aug 2025 
Master of IT in Business  (Artificial Intelligence)  
 
VELLORE  INSTITUTE  OF TECHNOLOGY, VELLORE, TAMIL NADU    Jul 2017  - Jun 2021  
Bachelor of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering                                    CGPA: 9.30/10.00  
Relevant Coursework: Fundamentals of Electronics, Microcontrollers, Electromagnetic Field Theory, Antenna Design  
 
EXPERIENCE  
DELOITTE  – Gurugram, Haryana , India  Jul 2021 - Jul 2024  
Technical Consultant  (Apr 2024 – Jul 2024 ) 
• Coordinated  team of 4 to build an automation  program, and successfully pitched to  10+ new clients , resulting in the 
onboarding of at least 5 new clients and satisfaction of client requirements, consisting of calculat ion of  client’s employee’s 
pension  
• Mentored  2 associate technology analysts in understanding client requirements & product  system architecture, resulting in the 
efficient operation of delivering products based on client requirements  by 15% and improved team morale  
Technical Analyst  (Jul 2021 – Mar 2024) 
• Developed  and implemented various  outbound, and inbound, web services, and enhancements  cloud -based integrations using 
SAP Cloud Platform Integration , resulting in the improvement of client’s HR processes  by 20%  
• Increased  time efficiency of the company to collect client’s employee’s compensation data to calculate client’s employee’s 
pension by 30% by identifying an opportunity to build an automation program  using Microsoft Power Automation  
• Achieved  Spot Award and Applause Award issued by Deloitte for contributions towards US-based  client work  
 
BHARTI AIRTEL  – Gurugram, Haryana , India  May  2019 - Jun 2019 
Software Testing Intern  
• Conducted  comprehensive software testing, adhering to compliance standards, for a 10+ set-top boxes (STB) including 
MPEG4, HEVC, PVR, as well as OTT and Android STB  
• Identified  and resolved  15+ software bugs and issues within the STB firmware, user interface, and functionalities, resulting in 
enhanced device performance  by 20%  and improved user experience  by 15%  
• Ensured  seamless compatibility between the set -top box and various television models, audio systems, and remote controls, 
effectively reducing compatibility -related customer complaints  by 10%  
• Acquired  in-depth knowledge of the hardware and software components comprising an STB, encompassing chipset, memory, 
operating system, middleware, and user interface  
• Developed  expertise in thoroughly testing 50+ STB features and functions, including channel switching, menu navigation, 
recording, playback, and interactive services  
• Performed  30+ regression tests for new  software updates to guarantee the absence of new bugs or issues in the system  
 
EXTRA -CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES / LEADERSHIP ROLES  
IMPACT DAY                                                                                                                                           Nov/2021  
Volunteer   
• Instructed  and enriched the learning experience of 15-20 underprivileged children  aged 10 -15 years in subjects like 
Mathematics, Science, and English  in rural places of Gurugram, resulting in e nhanced life skills 
• Authored  and disseminated  30+ interviews on  Virtual remote  Medium to reach an audience of 30+ people, endorsing the 
FormosArt platform for discovering, collecting, and investing in artworks  for the India Habitat Centre (IHC)  
 
ADDITIONAL  
• Certifications: Project B Adoption Program – PBAP (Deloitte, 2022); SAP Cloud Integration Platform (Udemy, 2021)  
• Technical Skills: Java , Python , JavaScript , C, C++ , SQL  
• Languages: English (Fluent), French (Beginner), Hindi (Native)  
• Work authorization: Singapore (internship) India (citizen)
job_description: Job descriptionPosition: Data Engineer (FHIR)We are seeking a skilled Data Engineer with hands-on experience in FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) to join our growing data team. This role focuses on designing, building, and maintaining healthcare data pipelines and operational data stores in cloud environments. Opportunity to work on exciting projects within Medtech/Healthcare domainKey Responsibilities:• Design, develop, and maintain data pipelines and ETL processes based on the FHIR standard• Implement and optimize Operational Data Stores (ODS) for healthcare data using FHIR on cloud platforms (preferably Google Cloud Platform)• Integrate structured and unstructured healthcare data from various sources into a unified data model• Develop solutions for streaming data ingestion, transformation, and real-time analytics• Collaborate with data architects, analysts, and stakeholders to ensure data accuracy, security, and performance• Contribute to the definition and implementation of data governance and quality standardsRequired Skills & Experience:• Strong experience working with FHIR and healthcare data interoperability standards• Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (GCP preferred) for data engineering and storage• Proficient in Python, SQL, and data pipeline frameworks (e.g., Apache Beam, Dataflow, or similar)• Experience with data streaming technologies (Kafka, Pub/Sub, etc.)• Familiarity with data warehousing, data modeling, and API-based data integration• Ability to work independently in a remote setup with occasional onsite collaboration• Experience with Big Query, FHIR servers, or healthcare APIs• Understanding of data privacy regulations (e.g., HIPAA, PDPA)When you apply, you voluntarily consent to the disclosure, collection and use of your personal data for employment/recruitment and related purposes in accordance with the Tech Aalto Privacy Policy, a copy of which is published at Tech Aalto’s website (https://www.techaalto.com/privacy/)Confidentiality is assured, and only shortlisted candidates will be notified for interviews.

missing_skills.suggestion: Take online courses or attend webinars to gain knowledge of FHIR and its applications in healthcare.
Familiarize yourself with Kafka, Pub/Sub, or other data streaming technologies.

skills_gap_analysis.technical_skills: The candidate lacks experience in FHIR, cloud-based data engineering, and interoperability standards. They need to develop skills in data streaming technologies and FHIR to be competitive.
skills_gap_analysis.soft_skills: The candidate's experience is mostly in technical consulting and software testing, which might not directly translate to a data engineer role. They should focus on developing skills in data engineering and data analytics.

analysis.experience_match_analysis: The candidate's experience is mostly in technical consulting and software testing, which doesn't directly match the requirements of a data engineer role. However, their experience in automation, cloud-based integrations, and data analysis could be valuable in a data engineer position.
analysis.education_match_analysis: The candidate's educational background in Electronics and Communication Engineering and Master's in IT with a focus on Artificial Intelligence might not be directly applicable to a data engineer position. However, their education could have provided a solid foundation in programming languages and data structures.

recommendations_for_improvement.recommendation: Quantify achievements with specific numbers and metrics
recommendations_for_improvement.guidance: Instead of stating 'increased time efficiency by 30%', specify the exact amount of time saved (e.g., 30% reduction in time taken to collect client's employee's compensation data).

recommendations_for_improvement.recommendation: Tailor the skills section to the job description
recommendations_for_improvement.guidance: List skills directly relevant to the data engineer position, such as FHIR, cloud platforms, data streaming technologies, and data analytics tools.

ats_optimization_suggestions.current_content: Technical Skills: Java , Python , JavaScript , C, C++ , SQL
ats_optimization_suggestions.suggested_change: Reorder the skills list to prioritize the most relevant ones for the data engineer role, and consider adding keywords like FHIR, cloud platforms, and data analytics.
ats_optimization_suggestions.formatting_suggestion: Use bullet points to make it easier to scan
ats_optimization_suggestions.reason: To increase the chances of passing ATS filters and catching the hiring manager's attention.

analysis.key_strengths: The candidate's experience in automation, cloud-based integrations, and data analysis could be valuable in a data engineer position. Their technical skills in programming languages and data structures are also a plus.
analysis.areas_of_improvement: The candidate needs to develop skills in data engineering, data analytics, and FHIR to be competitive. They should also focus on tailoring their resume to the specific job description and quantifying their achievements.
